subject: Knees
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams has withdrawn from the East West Bank Classic in Carson, Calif., because of an injured left knee. After practicing in the morning, Williams said she knew she could not play. Williams is scheduled to play for the United States at the Beijing Games.
